alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 7:20AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Greeley and Valley Counties through 745 AM CDT... At 720 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Comstock to 7 miles north of North Loup. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ord, North Loup and Elyria. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
